channel.title: Alegbra Help Needed
channel.description:
Well I have these two questions and was if anyone know the answer. The first one gets confusing because there is the number of hurricanes and number of years from the range 1944-2000. That gets more confusing with the question asked.Then the second one i don't know what they mean. :confused:Anyone mind helping me and explaining how to solve. :P :D
First Question - [img]http://img405.imageshack.us/img405/5114/picture2vn7.jpg[/img] Using the data from 1994 through 2000, the histogram show the number of years that had a particular number of hurricanes reaching the east coast of U.S. For example, in 14 of those years there was exactly one hurricane each year that reached the east coast of the U.S.? What is the median number of hurricanes per year reaching the east coast from 1994 through 2000
Second Question- What is the sum of all positive integers less than 100 that are squares of perfect squares.

item.title: Alegbra Help Needed
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

not sure about the first one, but i think on the second one

perfect squares = square numbers
1, 4, 9, 16, 25, 36, 49, 64, 81, 99, 100
so square each of them, and add up the ones which are less then 100
squares are
1, 16, 81, 256

1 + 16 + 81 = 98

dont know if its tright, but thats the impression i get

Read full topic

Well I have these two questions and was if anyone know the answer. The first one gets confusing because there is the number of hurricanes and number of years from the range 1944-2000. That gets more confusing with the question asked.Then the second one i donâ€™t know what they mean. Anyone mind helping me and explaining how to solve.

First Question -

Using the data from 1994 through 2000, the histogram show the number of years that had a particular number of hurricanes reaching the east coast of U.S. For example, in 14 of those years there was exactly one hurricane each year that reached the east coast of the U.S.? What is the median number of hurricanes per year reaching the east coast from 1994 through 2000

Second Question-
What is the sum of all positive integers less than 100 that are squares of perfect squares.
